Visit site

Client

Orysya Kurilo is a real estate profesional that specializes in rental properties around Metro Boston Area.

Challenge

Build an Application where Admin can manage properties and showcase tehm to clients with the ability of clients to contact them.

Objectives

- Full admin sytem to manage properties.
- Contact form for users.
- Resposive webnsite
- Make the website Ellegant
- Fast performance

Solution

Created a simple Resposive user friendly application where users can keep tracK of their job applications. Application was updated to use React Hooks

Impact

Client is now able to list all of their available properties to their customers. & Customers can get in touch with the client with the contact form relating any listing querstions they have.
